root: ^Buff Rat: You're interested in career advising, huh...
^Buff Rat: Well, I hear it's rough out there.
^Buff Rat: In my past life, I was a landlord.
^Buff Rat: If you can purchase a building with 1,000,000 floors and a basement, and then you rent it out...
^Buff Rat: You can make good money that way!
^Buff Rat: What career are you looking at right now?
^Buff Rat: Well, if all else fails, you can become a psychic like me.
^Buff Rat: You'll have to settle for #2 though.
^Buff Rat: But I don't mind teaching you the ropes.
^Buff Rat: Right, well, just let me know.
^Buff Rat: Normally, I'd charge, but considering your current predicament...
^Buff Rat: You can pay me what you owe me in the next life, I suppose.
